description:
Sunraku and his new party fight on the ghost ship and unlock the next stage of the Ctarnidd quest: an underwater city!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu la paix, réveille-toi, cité fantôme
Revive, Broken City, Your Peace at an End
Seihitsu ga Owaru, Haito yo Nigiyaka Nare
静謐が終わる, 廃都よ賑やかなれ
